turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a pizza from Bella Luna's. Can you help me out?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order four pizzas medium and all thick crust? One pizza can I have all cheese, the second pizza can I have a meat lovers?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third can I have a supreme pizza with everything on it, and the fourth pizza can I get a veggie lover pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 medium thick crust pizzas, 1 cheese, 1 meatlovers, 1 veggie lovers, and 1 supreme, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much for your help. I really appreciate it.
